item.title: Botejão - A motivation to write Rust
item.description: When learning Rust I started many toy projects. One of them was Botejão. It was never meant to be anything more than a Telegram Bot to check my universities (UNICAMP) daily menu. In the beginning users would need to ask the bot for the menu and then get a reply. Later it got a few upgrades and now it sends the day’s menu every night to a channel. However, I always felt like this bot could do more.

item.title: About me
item.description: I’m just a guy who really likes writing Rust.
